title: Cambridge 18 — Test 1 (Reading)
content:
Cambridge 18 — Test 1 (Reading)#Below are a few sample questions from the Cambridge 18 Reading Test 1. Replace or expand these with the real test content and answers.
Questions#What is the primary purpose of the passage? Show AnswerThe primary purpose is to explain the historical development of the transportation system and its impact on urban growth.According to paragraph 2, which factor most influenced the decline of the industry? Show AnswerParagraph 2 cites increased international competition and the shift to automated manufacturing as the main factors.Which of the following best summarizes the author’s attitude towards new regulation? Show AnswerThe author is cautiously supportive, acknowledging benefits but warning about unintended consequences.

title: IELTS Academic
content: Welcome to the IELTS Academic section. Use the reading, listening, writing and speaking subfolders to organize tests and answer keys.
